title: Client A — Retail & Wholesale Digitization
description: End‑to‑end operational infrastructure: B2C, B2B, CRM, invoicing, inventory sync, shipping, and reporting.
body:
Outcomes

  • ~80% less manual admin
  • 10× order capacity ready
  • Unified reporting across B2C/B2B

title: Client B — Coaching/Community Platform Systems
description: Custom build: simplified IA, unified membership/content, admin analytics, event‑driven automations.
body:
Scope

  • Navigation and content model
  • Membership layer and permissions
  • Revenue/engagement analytics

title: Mac Assistant — Local AI Automation
description: Privacy‑first macOS menu bar assistant for quick actions and scripted workflows.
body:
Capabilities

  • Launch apps, file search, summaries
  • Notes and email drafts
  • Pluggable tools

title: Client D — Artist Portfolio & Archive System
description: Responsive portfolio with gallery/metadata, contact/booking, and optional direct sales.

title: Client C — Fitness Operations Automation
description: Integrated payments, scheduling, and CRM with standardized onboarding.
